instructions.name: Open file
instructions.description: Opens a file and returns a file handle.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path to the file to be opened

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: File open mode, "r" by default, "w" to overwrite, "a" to append, "x" to create

instructions.name: Read file to string
instructions.description: Opens a file and reads it to a string.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path to the file to be opened

parameters.name: saveAs
parameters.description: Selector where to save the contents

instructions.name: Write string to file
instructions.description: Writes a string to a file.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path to the file to be opened

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Selector where to save the contents

description: Blocks used to interact with the file system.
